alert.note: Alert for Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 02 at 11:55AM AKST until February 02 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Skagway and the Klondike Highway. * WHEN...Through 6 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow can significantly lower visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lighter snowfall rates likely Wednesday afternoon and evening. Expect blowing snow through tonight with visibility reductions and significant drifting. Additional light snow is expected to continue through the end of the week; however confidence is low regarding a possible transition to rain at sea level.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
